original_text: for he had often been bound with shackles and chains, but he wrenched the chains apart, and he broke the shackles in pieces. No one had the strength to subdue him.
korean_text: 이는 여러 번 고랑과 쇠사슬에 매였어도 쇠사슬을 끊고 고랑을 깨뜨렸음이러라 그리하여 아무도 그를 제어할 힘이 없는지라

sentences.original_text: for he had often been bound with shackles and chains
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자주 족쇄와 사슬에 묶였었기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: but he wrenched the chains apart
and he broke the shackles in pieces
No one had the strength to subdue him
